record.field: A well planned, inclusive and resilient capital city

KCCA's main strategic goal is to develop Kampala into a well planned, inclusive and resilient capital city that provides quality services to all residents while promoting sustainable development and economic growth.

This strategic goal encompasses:

  • Comprehensive urban planning and development
  • Inclusive service delivery for all residents
  • Climate resilience and environmental sustainability
  • Economic growth and development
  • Good governance and institutional excellence
